name: Sushi Sushi -- Demo
description:
Sushi Sushi, so nice they named it twice is a restaurant in trendy Royal Oak featuring upscale authentic Japanese cuisine.  The menu includes exotic items such as eel, shark, and turtle.  

The offer here allows you to purchase a $50 gift card for the price of $25.  Meals range from $12 to $24.  Sushi Sushi features a full bar that offers traditional Japanese beers as well as Saki.  

The environment is upscale, with post-modern decor accompanied by ambient music.  On Friday nights the restaurant employs a live DJ, and tables are moved out of the way accommodate dancing.
